banner.subtitle: Elevating Every Interaction
banner.description: Imagine a digital journey where each moment feels tailor-made: seamless, inviting, and unexpectedly delightful. From the first glance to the final click, I sculpt experiences that immerse you in clarity and elegance, transforming every visit into a memorable adventure, crafted just for you.

cta.description: Ready to bring your vision to life? Let's discuss how these skills can solve your challenges.

ossv2.description: Spearheaded the complete rewrite of the national Online Single Submission portal, migrating from JavaScript to TypeScript and implementing modern, SEO-friendly features with Next.js (SSR/SSG).

oss.description: Spearheaded the complete rewrite of the national Online Single Submission portal, migrating from JavaScript to TypeScript and implementing modern, SEO-friendly features with Next.js (SSR/SSG).

maybank.description: Developed and maintained both the customer-facing M2U web app using ReactJS and the internal BackOffice system with Java, Spring Boot, and Thymeleaf, ensuring seamless integration and high performance.

satunadi.description: Built two critical healthcare portals from scratch using Next.js and TypeScript. Implemented robust state management with Redux-Toolkit for complex data handling in clinical and DTP dashboards.

briapi.description: Engineered UI applications for BRI's API management (MIS-BRIAPI) and internal Dynamic Channel using ReactJS and MUI, integrating with both REST and GraphQL APIs for versatile data flow.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: From Code to Cloud: A Developer's Journey
about.description: With over 8 years in the digital trenches, I've evolved from a dedicated Frontend Developer to a versatile FullStack professional, passionate about building complex web applications that are both functional and delightful. My journey across companies like Maybank and Telkom has equipped me with a robust skill set in React, Next.js, and Java Springboot. I don't just write code; I architect seamless user experiences, optimize for performance and SEO, and thrive in agile environments.

maybank.title: FullStack Developer
maybank.description: Developing various web applications (M2U, BackOffice, Corporate) and backend microservices using ReactJS, Java Springboot, and CMS Sitecore.

telkom.title: Sr. Frontend Web Developer
telkom.description: Led the rewrite of OSS Portal to V2 using Next.js & TypeScript. Built multiple CMS dashboards and internal portals with React and Vue.

cronos.title: Mid. Frontend Web Developer
cronos.description: Built MIS-BRIAPI Auto Debit application for BRI using ReactJS and Material UI, focusing on API integration and Redux state management.

telkomsigma.title: Frontend Web Developer
telkomsigma.description: Developed various government and enterprise projects such as LPPD & EKPPD using Vue.js/Nuxt.js and internal applications with React.js.

infosys.title: Mobile & Web Developer
infosys.description: Involved in building Brimo BRI mobile app, My Indihome, and My Telkom Solution, as well as web portal for CIMB Niaga.

badrus.content: Herlan is a very dedicated developer with exceptional problem-solving skills. His contribution to the OSS V2 project was significant, especially in performance optimization and SSR/SSG implementation.

sarah.content: Working with Herlan is always a pleasure. He not only understands technical requirements but also understands business needs. His work is always high quality and on time.

gunawan.content: Herlan has very solid frontend skills. His abilities in React and state management are impressive. He also keeps up with the latest technologies.

syauqi.content: Herlan is a fast learner developer, also willingness to learn new things always running on his head. In addition to work as a good dev mate, he also a nice guy to talk with.
